It's NEVER too late to live your best life unless YOU say it is.

Are you a high-achieving individual who knows there's more to life than just checking boxes?

Imagine:
• Waking up excited about your life every single day
• Finally writing that novel, starting that non-profit, or launching that dream business

1. Get crystal clear on what you truly want (not what you think you should want)
2. Create a realistic roadmap to make it happen
3. Take bold, intentional action towards your dreams
4. Build deep self-belief and unshakeable confidence

• 30+ years experience helping folks from Fortune 50s to start-ups to individuals make their dreams a reality
• Certified life coach & strategic consultant
• Host of "Living Your Best Damn Life" podcast
• Pink-haired, 50-something badass who rebuilt herself in her 40s
• Cycle breaker, rebel with a cause, and firm believer that it's never too late to create the life you want

My promise to you:
• No BS, just real talk and practical strategies
• Tailored approach to YOUR unique brain and circumstances
• Push you outside your comfort zone (gently but firmly)
• Remind you of your inherent badassery when you forget

Ready to create your best damn life? Here's how we can make it happen:

1. Go All-In Intensive: 3-month 1:1 program to make your bold vision a reality
2. Living Your Best Damn Life Podcast: Expert wisdom, motivation and actionable strategies
3. Speaking & podcasting

"F*ck yeah I did!" feels pretty damn great to say OFTEN. Join me!

Holistic executive coaching for visionary CEOs and their leaders.  

CEO's: Don't lose yourself as you take your company to the next level. Learn to live fully engaged, push boundaries, and be seen and heard as the leader you are. caneel.com/podcast.

Dr. Caneel Joyce coaches unique and visionary leaders and creators generating far-reaching impacts on climate change and the most pressing challenges facing humanity. company_description:
In 2019, I used my layoff from GE as an opportunity to transform my life.  One aspect of that was through moving to a low carb lifestyle, which has resulted in me losing over 70 lbs and getting off of blood pressure medication for the first time in two decades.  I also tapped into my passion for training and cooking to create SeriousKeto.

Since then, SeriousKeto has become one of the top 1/2 of 1% of ALL YouTube channels and has over 200K social media subscribers/followers.  On any given day, my content is viewed by 20K to 30K individuals, as I share recipes, motivation and inspiration to people who want to take control of their health naturally.

It's been so rewarding to get comments, messages and emails daily from my followers, thanking me for helping them lose weight, conquer diabetes, eliminate inflammation, and get off of prescription medications.  I also get the opportunity to fight the immense amounts of misinformation propagated by the media, big food, and big pharma about the many health benefits of a low carb lifestyle.

Neal Schaffer created his social media strategy consultancy Windmills Marketing DBA NealSchaffer.com and PDCA Social to fill a gap that brands and companies have between their willingness to effectively implement social media throughout their organization and their ability to do so. Neal believed the answer to this problem is two-fold: 1) Many companies simply lacked the experience of working deeply with social media platforms and/or were not maximizing the full functionality they provided and 2) Companies lack a strategy and structure for which to govern the everyday activities of their social efforts and tie it in with the ROI for whatever strategic corporate objective they have. Neal, therefore, created a unique and completely proprietary social media strategy consulting program which, combined with his social media coaching and training, has helped dozens of companies better leverage and strategically utilize social media for a variety of objectives, including marketing, sales, business development, customer service, reputation management, and crisis management. The proprietary framework and process used to develop a social media strategy forms the basis of Neal's book Maximize Your Social.

Neal's firm provides the following social media consulting services:

Social Media Strategy Consulting

Social Media Coaching

Social Media Training and Workshops

company_description:
#1 Bestselling Author, Beloved Speaker + Live Inspired Podcast Host

Expected to die. Now teaching others how to truly live.

In 1987, John O'Leary was a curious nine-year-old boy. Playing with fire and gasoline, John created a massive explosion in his home and was burned on 100% of his body. He was given less than a 1% chance to live.

His epic story of survival has never felt more relevant, as we experience the coronavirus pandemic and its aftermath. John‘s story, perspective and inspiration have inspired millions of people and 2,000 clients over more than 12 years.

John is the two-time national bestselling author of ON FIRE and IN AWE. Released in May 2020, many are saying 'IN AWE' is exactly what we all need right now. (Also, $30,000 of early proceeds were donated to support youth impacted by the economic fallout from the pandemic.)

John is an inspirational speaker teaching, 50,000+ people each year around the world and via virtual experiences how to live inspired.

John is the host of the Live Inspired Podcast with more than 1.2 million downloads and amazing guests each week like Brené Brown, Dave Ramsey, Joe Buck, Ozzie Smith, Kurt Warner and more.

Consistently described as "the best speaker we've ever had," John's emotional story-telling, unexpected humor, and authenticity make each of his presentations, experiences, episodes and interactions truly transformational.

John would be honored to join your team virtually to shift perspective, refocus and unite during this season of change. Please email Heather@JohnOLearyInspires.com for more information.

company_description:
Hideaway Circus is a circus, dance, and multi-media producing company founded and run by Brooklyn based creators Josh & Lyndsay Aviner. 

The company's original live theatrical productions include: Stars Above, an American open-air touring circus; Beyond Babel, a two-time Drama Desk nominated dance show and a ‘Critics Pick' of the The New York Times; Reflex, a unique theatrical experience that unravels 4,000 years of juggling; and the genre-defying slasher circus nightclub experience Slumber.

Josh and Lyndsay have released over 125 episodes of Hideaway Circus Podcast. Starting in 2015, the podcast features behind the scenes look at the circus with interviews of creators, producers, and directors in the circus and related arts. In 2018, the company produced a series of circus and dance experiences designed specifically to be watched in a virtual reality headset. In 2021 they created and sold unique NFTs for their production Beyond Babel.

Whether you are a chief executive, Head of Function, programme manager, or leading across boundaries, you know that success depends on the effectiveness of the team around you.

You are in a very challenging place, but the opportunities are significant. You need help to build leadership capability. Immediate issues include:

🔹   A lack of critical inquiry and constructive challenge in senior team conversations.  

🔹   Decision-making is hesitant and inconsistent. Implementation lacks energy and accountability.

🔹   Imbalance of focus between managing operations and leading strategically.

🔹   Alignment. The business has grown quickly. Common purpose and unity of effort are beginning to wobble. 

🔹   Not everyone on the senior team fully understands or is playing to their individual strengths. Good people who could lead with more confidence and impact. 

WHY US?

🟢   WE UNDERSTAND YOUR SITUATION. Our network of associates have led/are leading in a range of senior and high consequence leadership roles across private, public, and not-for-profit sectors. 🟢   WE ARE WISE AND THE RIGHT SIDE OF RUTHLESS! Given our backgrounds you can imagine we have made our fair share of mistakes. Great learning moments plus successes and a lot of continuous professional development. Clients call us wise. One called us the "right side of ruthless"!

🟢   AMAZING SCOTTISH SPACES. Place impacts the way people think and engage. We will recommend the spaces that will best support the inquiry-based conversations and experiences needed to develop your team's leadership capability. We specialise in working in amazing Scottish spaces, indoors and outdoors.

Coaching, sounding board, team charters, red teaming, after action reviews, holding to account, leadership journeys, team workshops/walkshops, team decelerators, team missions.

company_description:
We Bridge the gap between Influencers and Brands. We work with brands and help them connect with their target audience through the use of our influencer network. Choosing the right influencers for your brand can be tough. But that's where we come in to help. We have a network of influencers from a huge variety of backgrounds. Each with their own skillset and based in a certain area. You name an area, there is going to be an influencer available. We help connect your brand to the right consumer.

Influencer marketing is becoming one of the most effective ways of bringing your brand to a personal level of which consumers can trust. We can bring these influencers to work with your brand to help make your brand and products resonate with your target audience.

Anything to do with transportation or engineering is what we love and so do our influencers. We won't just provide an influencer on their reach. We measure their engagement to make sure it suits the brands wants and needs and also the influencers.

company_description:
Welcome to Being Lean! If you want to experience and learn about a life-changing methodology that will help you balance your workload, keep you productive and increase your free time, then you've come to the right place. The aim of this website is to create a community of like-minded Lean practitioners to share best practices and support each other on the road to an improved quality of life.

Most people will have heard of Lean methodology in their working environment and never consider taking it further, more holistically or in a structured manner. But if it works, why not introduce it into all areas of your life? Lean living can help you get motivated to, among other things, get healthy, improve the upkeep of your home, be a bit more environmentally friendly and make your travel experiences that much more enjoyable.

The book, Being Lean, is designed to kickstart or rejuvenate your journey to a more effective and healthier lifestyle that gives you more time for yourself. But it doesn't stop there. To keep you inspired and motivate your desire for change, there's a ton of extra content right here. You can share stories and experiences with other Lean advocates on the Lean Exchange, read up on best practices through our exciting Blogs, develop your Lean Lifestyle using downloadable Resources and even win a few helpful Lean goodies to boost your success. Wherever you are on your self-improvement journey, welcome to your Lean Portal!

company_description:
As with our namesake, we're a bit more aggressive than most are used to in an agency partner.  We're okay with that. We believe that the modern agency needs to live the strategy we suggest to our clients. Authenticity. If we think you are doing it wrong, we'll tell you. We'll argue with you. It's the only way to make sure we are doing it right. Be passionate. If we don't believe in the work, we'll be honest and suggest you find someone else.

If we don't believe in every piece of work we do, how can we bring that to your community? It's our mission to align ourselves with the right clients, that we can be successful for. Don't expect soft results either. We know you have one job. Sell stuff (see website - LI made us change that word).  It doesn't matter what department you are in. It's one business and one goal. Sell product.

Ultimately you work for a company that needs to sell their products. We get that.

If you are being told it's about ‘likes' or ‘views' or ‘go viral, it's bull and you need a new partner. 

It's about selling your products.  We know that with the right social strategy, the right content to fulfill that strategy, and the analytics to measure it, that we'll test, iterate and ultimately use your budget with the greatest efficiency on the right channels and drive the awareness, growth and ultimately sales that your product or business needs.

Do you still think that TV and Banner ads are going to do the trick with the same efficiency and effectiveness? It won't. We'll prove it.

Inspired by the boom in demand of independent brands and goods, we set about developing a concept agency that provides all the necessary services to deliver full brand success, specifically against corporate competition in our sector.

We deal primarily with the hard to reach "early adopters", and have the ability to establish a platform of credibility for your brand that inspires consumer desire and wholesale growth, before rolling out communications to a wider mainstream audience.
Strategy and longevity are key to us, and we can offer an economic and, crucially, transparent agency service that feels like an in-house extension of your brand. No overblown retainers, no "promise the world", no excuses, no hidden fees, bills or expenses, we like to share with our clients.

The team at Sandbox is one of the most trusted and knowledgeable PR and influencer relations agencies in gaming and entertainment. We are publicists, streamers, marketers and storytellers with a profound passion for the things you create.

We work primarily with publishers and developers of games and products for PC, PlayStation 4/5, Xbox One and Xbox Series X, Nintendo Switch, virtual reality (Oculus/Vive/Gear) and iOS/Android. Current clients include Saber Interactive, Larian, Focus Home Interactive, Crystal Dynamics, Raw Fury, THQ Nordic, Fatshark, and Crytek.

What separates Sandbox from other public relations firms is the strength of our relationships with media and influencers in a culture that is constantly reinventing itself. We believe in active - not automated - outreach, leveraging our deep understanding of the marketplace to execute strategic campaigns that elevate your brand above the crowd with measurable results.

Headquartered in NYC with additional staff on the West Coast and partner agencies throughout the world, Sandbox delivers scale, flexibility and discipline to fit your organization. Our specialists are intimately familiar with the realities of how companies like yours operate, as well as where our talents can integrate most effectively. With day-to-day communication, creativity, planning and responsiveness, we are there to give you the support you need where and when you need it. Sandbox Strategies is an Embracer Group company.

Made in est la première maison de marques franco-canadienne.
Nous travaillons fort pour développer et exécuter des stratégies créatives et performantes en marketing de contenu pour nos clients. Passionnés par le contenu numérique, nous faisons de chaque tendance de nouveaux leviers de croissance. Nous testons tous les nouveaux réseaux sociaux et leurs mises à jour, de façon à les associer au mieux à l'évolution des habitudes de consommation des générations Y et Z. Nous valorisons la créativité, l'esprit d'équipe et la persévérance pour repousser les limites.
Depuis le lancement de Maison Made in, nous avons construit une solide base de clients internationaux dans les industries de la beauté, de la mode et du lifestyle (Avène, Klorane, Cokluch, Quartz-co., Gusta, Films Séville, Fromageries Bel Canada, Vins Philippe Dandurand, Ivanhoé Cambridge, Les Producteurs laitiers du Canada, etc.).

company_description:
At B2B Better, we do one thing and we do it really well. 

Podcasts. 

And we specialise in creating shows for service and solution-based companies. 

Why?   Because when you sell services, you are selling YOUR specific expertise. And what we believe the best way to demonstrate that is to… well, literally talk about it. 

Do any of these problems sound familiar to you? 

❌ Our sales cycles are long and complex. We need to enable our commercial team to prospect better. 

❌ We work with so many amazing clients, but we just can't get the legal team to sign off on a case study. 

❌ Clients work with us because we understand their problem better than anyone. But no-one knows who we are. 

All of these problems (and more!) can be solved with a podcast. But it's not enough to just record a Zoom conversation and stick a jingle on either end. You need to take a strategic marketing mindset around HOW the podcast can be leveraged to achieve your desired outcomes. 

And that's what we do. We're a Podcast Marketing Agency that does great production - not a production agency trying to figure out marketing. 

Want to find out how a podcast can help unlock your commercial goals? Get in touch here: https://www.b2b-better.com/contact

Hosted by Krissy Vann, a former Canadian television personality and fitness competitor, our channel is tailored to fitness and wellness professionals, as well as enthusiasts like you.

The ATFW podcast releases every Wednesday, featuring in-depth conversations with thought leaders and influencers in the fitness and wellness industry. company_description:
Tylite Digital is a boutique agency that specializes in digital and social marketing for the entertainment industry. We strive to create comprehensive and holistic campaigns for film and television properties, beginning in production, that elevate awareness and engage audiences throughout their lifecycle.
 
We are brand marketers, digital strategists, and content creators. Our services include strategy development, content ideation, and creation, social media management, copywriting, influencer campaigns, email marketing, digital media planning & buying, digital PR and event management. 

Tylite Digital was founded by Lauren Jacob, an award-winning marketer, who has over 10 years' experience in the entertainment industry in Toronto, Los Angeles, and New York. Lauren has worked at Alliance Films, eOne Entertainment, Rogers Communications, and Focus Features. She has overseen digital marketing campaigns for hundreds of entertainment properties, ranging from blockbuster mega-hits like The Hunger Games to indie darlings like The King's Speech and Darkest Hour. In 2015 Lauren was named one of Marketing Magazine's 30 Under 30 and in 2018 the digital campaign she led for Won't You Be My Neighbor won a Shorty Web Award for a Multi-Platform Campaign.
